name: Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co.
description: Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co. is one of the largest metals service center companies in North America, dedicated to the distribution and processing of a wide range of metals. Founded in 1939, Reliance has built a strong reputation for providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service. The company specializes in the distribution of steel, aluminum, and other metal products, serving industries such as aerospace, automotive, construction, and manufacturing. With a vast network of over 300 locations across the United States and in various international markets, Reliance is well-positioned to meet the diverse needs of its customers. The company continually invests in technology and processes to enhance operational efficiency and maintain its commitment to sustainability. Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co. has a diverse portfolio of subsidiaries, each focused on specific metal products and services, ensuring a comprehensive offering for its clients. The company's mission is to provide the highest quality materials and unparalleled service, while also fostering long-term relationships with suppliers and customers alike. By prioritizing innovation and customer satisfaction, Reliance aims to strengthen its position as a leader in the metal distribution industry.

seo.meta_title: Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co. | Leading Metal Service Center
seo.meta_description: Explore Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co., a leading provider of metal products and services. Discover their commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What does Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co. do?
faq.answer: Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co. is a leading distributor and processor of metals, including steel and aluminum, serving various industries.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co.?
faq.answer: Jim Hoffman is the CEO of Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co.

faq.question: Where is Reliance Steel headquartered?
faq.answer: Reliance Steel is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Reliance Steel offer?
faq.answer: Reliance Steel offers a wide range of metal products, including steel, aluminum, copper, and brass, as well as processing services.
